headline.main: U.S.-Backed Syrian Force Cuts Last Road Out of IS Stronghold
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Backed Syrian Force Cuts Last Road Out of IS Stronghold

lead_paragraph: U.S.-backed Syrian militias cut the last main road out of Islamic State-held Raqqa on Monday, severing the highway between the group's de facto capital and its stronghold of Deir al-Zor province, a militia spokesman said.
snippet: U.S.-backed Syrian militias cut the last main road out of Islamic State-held Raqqa on Monday, severing the highway between the group's de facto capital and its stronghold of Deir al-Zor province, a militia spokesman said....
